::Zardus::

Zardus calmly looks down at Feline as she threatens him with her claws, a bit 
surprised at her reaction. It wasn't consistent with her programming, he'd 
have to check on it later.

"Relax. One of my troops accidently fired on you, thinking you were an enemy. 
He has been punished."

He looks at her claws, then back at her. "I suggest you put those away, one 
wrong move could cost your life. Follow me for the drink."

He walks to the door, looking back at her as it opens. "Welcome to the 
Alliance," he says, "I am Zardus, your commander."
